full_summary:
# North Slope of Parliament Hill Escarpment Vegetation Management Services

**Solicitation Number:** MA073
**Date of Publication:** July 24, 2023
**Closing Date:** August 11, 2023, at 3:00 PM EDT

The National Capital Commission invites proposals for specialized landscape maintenance and other related services for the north slope of Parliament Hill in Ottawa, the National Capital. 

The successful bidder will be responsible for:

* Invasive species management
* Selective pruning
* Slope stabilization and erosion control
* Soil improvement
* Planting of thousands of new trees, shrubs, and perennials

The contract is expected to begin on September 4, 2023, and end on March 31, 2027.

To submit an Enquiry, please email Senior Contract Officer Micheline Al-Koutsi at [micheline.al-koutsi@ncc-ccn.ca](mailto:micheline.al-koutsi@ncc-ccn.ca). All Enquiries must be received no later than seven (7) calendar days prior to the date set for solicitation closing.

**Submission Address:**
Bid email address: Bids-soumissions@ncc-ccn.ca
Tender file no.: MA073

This procurement process is subject to the trade agreements listed below.

For more information and to obtain the Request for Proposal (RFP) document, please visit the Canada Buys website at [CanadaBuysCanada](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). We recommend downloading the document to ensure you have access to all relevant information and to avoid any potential issues.

**Contracting Entity Information:**

* National Capital Commission
* Address: 202-40 Elgin Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 1C7
* Contact: Micheline Al-Koutsi
* Email: [micheline.al-koutsi@ncc-ccn.ca](mailto:micheline.al-koutsi@ncc-ccn.ca)
* Phone: (343) 552-5974

**Invitation Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
**Location:** The National Capital Region (NCR), specifically Ottawa
**Security Level:** Unclassified
